sentences.en: Do you know anything about the Quakers, the Quaker religion?
sentences.cn: 你知道教友派信徒吗, 教友派教条?

sentences.en: Its principal businesses include: Frito - Lay snacks, Pepsi - Cola beverages, Gatorade sports drinks, Tropicana juices and Quaker foods.
sentences.cn: 公司的主要业务包括菲多利休闲食品 、 百事可乐饮料 、 佳得乐运动饮料 、 纯果乐果汁和桂格麦片食品.

sentences.en: PepsiCo acquired Tropicana in 1998 and merged with The Quaker Oats Company ( including Gatorade ) in 2001.
sentences.cn: 百事于1998年收购了纯果乐,2001年整合了桂格公司 ( 包括佳得乐 ).

sentences.en: PepsiCo acquired Tropicana in 1998 and merged with The Quaker Oats Company in 2001.
sentences.cn: 百事于1998年收购了纯果乐,2001年整合了桂格公司.

sentences.en: PepsiCo's principal businesses include: Frito - Lay snacks, Pepsi - Cola beverages, Gatorade sports drinks, Tropicana juices and Quaker foods.
sentences.cn: 公司的主要业务包括: 菲多利休闲食品 、 百事可乐饮料 、 佳得乐运动饮料 、 纯果乐果汁和桂格麦片食品.

sentences.en: Product Range: Cheetos, Lay's Chips and Quaker Oatmeal.
sentences.cn: 旗舰产品包括奇多玉米片 、 事薯片和早餐麦片食品桂格等.

sentences.en: Quaker Oats merged by PepsiCo, so as engineering consultant for some company.
sentences.cn: 由于贵格公司被百事可乐公司兼并, 暂做某些公司工程顾问.

sentences.en: These are issues of management competence rather than values, Quaker or otherwise.
sentences.cn: 这些是管理能力问题,而与价值观 、 贵格会或其它问题无关.

sentences.en: William Penn wrote in the cool, charitable vein of the Quaker faith.
sentences.cn: 威廉·佩恩以较左派冷静宽仁的特性写作.

trans.tran_cn: 教友会教徒，教友派信徒
trans.tran_en: a member of the Society of Friends, a Christian religious group that meets without any formal ceremony or priests and that is opposed to violence
